applicant-name.name: SUZHOU QITIAN NEW MAT CO LTD
苏州祺添新材料股份有限公司

invention-title: Electrolyte additive composition, non-aqueous electrolyte containing additive composition and lithium ion battery
一种电解液添加剂组合物及含该添加剂组合物的非水电解液和锂离子电池

abstract.p: The invention belongs to the field of lithium ion batteries, and particularly discloses an electrolyte additive composition, a non-aqueous electrolyte containing the additive composition and a lithium ion battery. The additive composition contains an additive A, an additive B and an additive C, the additive A is unsaturated cyclic carbonate with a structure of a general formula I, the additive B is unsaturated chain carbonate with a structure of a general formula II, and the additive C is an organosilicon compound. # imgabs0, wherein R1 is selected from a substituted or unsubstituted alkylene group containing an olefinic bond or an acetylenic bond; r1, R2 and R3 are mutually independently selected from alkyl or fluorine-containing alkyl with the carbon atom number of 1-6, R4, R5, R6 and R7 are mutually independently selected from hydrogen atoms, fluorine atoms or alkyl with the carbon atom number of 1-6, and X is vinylidene or ethynylene. The lithium ion battery adopting the electrolyte additive composition has excellent high-temperature storage performance and low-temperature cycle performance.

本申请属于锂离子电池领域，具体公开了一种电解液添加剂组合物及含该添加剂组合物的非水电解液和锂离子电池。该添加剂组合物中含有添加剂A、B和C，添加剂A为具有通式Ⅰ结构的不饱和环状碳酸酯，添加剂B为具有通式Ⅱ结构的不饱和链状碳酸酯，添加剂C为有机硅类化合物；#imgabs0#其中，R1选自取代或未取代的含有烯键或炔键的亚烃基；R2、R3相互独立地选自碳原子数为1～6的烃基或含氟烃基，R4、R5、R6、R7相互独立地选自氢原子、氟原子或碳原子数为1～6的烃基，X基团为亚乙烯基或亚乙炔基。采用本申请中电解液添加剂组合物的锂离子电池，具有优异的高温存储性能和低温循环性能。
